document_data.name: Seared devil
document_data.mainbody: '''Seared devils''', also called '''scorch devils''' were soldiers of the [[Nine Hells]] fuelled by their envy to burn the uncharred.
document_data.Description: Seared devils resembled horribly burned or charred [[humanoid]]s.
document_data.Personality: Seared devils were blindly jealous of all unburned creatures.
document_data.Abilities: Seared devils were naturally resistant to fire. Additionally, the choking, stinking ash they shed left their victims burned, slowed down, and on the verge of vomiting.
document_data.Combat: Seared devils attacked by simply throwing their bodies into opponents, snarling as they raced towards the nearest fresh bodies.
document_data.History: In the late years of the 15{{Th}} century [[DR]], the [[Ashmadai]] cells of [[Neverwinter]] were known to employ the services of seared devils.<ref>
